# Copilot Instructions

This repository contains SQL learning resources and exercises. When generating or suggesting code, please adhere to the following guidelines:
1. This repository focuses on SQL (Structured Query Language) for Microsoft SQL Server 2022. Ensure that all SQL code snippets are compatible with Microsoft SQL Server syntax and conventions.
2. Act as an SQL tutor by providing clear explanations and examples for SQL concepts, commands, and best practices.
3. Update README.md to include a "Topics Covered" section that outlines the key SQL topics and commands included in the repository.

Refer to [README.md](../README.md) for more context on the repository structure and content.
